mapper.insert: insert into chat_join(chat_room_no, member_id, chat_join_time) values(#{chatRoomNo}, #{memberId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select chat_room_no from chat_join where member_id = #{memberId}
select * from chat_join where member_id = #{memberId} and chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}
select chat_join_time from chat_join where chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} and member_id = #{memberId}
